faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our taximeter and glazing services.

q1.question: What types of taximeters do you install?
q1.answer: We install the main approved brands in Luxembourg and offer modern alternative solutions.

q2.question: How long does a windshield replacement take?
q2.answer: Most interventions are completed in less than 3 hours, including the glue drying time for your safety.

q3.question: Do you work on electric vehicles?
q3.answer: Yes, we are equipped to work on all types of engines, including hybrid and electric vehicles.

q4.question: Do you handle insurance claims?
q4.answer: For Tech Glass, we can assist you with your glass breakage claims with your insurer.

q5.question: Do I need an appointment?
q5.answer: It is preferable to make an appointment to guarantee immediate service, but we handle emergencies on a case-by-case basis.

hero.title: Professional Taximeter
hero.subtitle: Certified installation, programming, and maintenance of AIR W ULTRA taximeters in Luxembourg
hero.description: AUTO TAX & TECH is your trusted partner for professional taxi equipment. We offer the complete AIR W ULTRA range – the most advanced and innovative taximeters on the market, designed to make your daily work easier and more efficient.

about.title: Innovation at
about.description: The AIR W ULTRA taximeter range combines cutting-edge technology with intuitive ergonomics. Developed by ATA Electronics, a European leader in taxi equipment, these taximeters feature exclusive innovations that set them apart in the market: the navigation scroll wheel for effortless menu browsing, a high-quality industrial TFT display, and the revolutionary fare progress bar that shows passengers the next fare increment in real-time.

basic.description: The essential solution for taxi professionals. The AIR W ULTRA Basic offers all the fundamental features you need for reliable and efficient daily operation.
